member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.AnnotationElement
member.summary: Represents an annotation (tag or option).

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType
member.summary: Defines the various types of step arguments.

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType.Text
member.summary: Text-only argument (this is the default if we can't detect anything more specific).

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType.NumericInteger
member.summary: Integer argument (optionally prefixed with a symbol).

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType.NumericDecimal
member.summary: Decimal argument (optionally prefixed with a symbol).

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType.Interpolated
member.summary: An interpolated argument (text based, but evaluation delayed until runtime).

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.ArgumentType.Empty
member.summary: An empty argument.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltBackground
member.summary: A built background block.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltContent
member.summary: Defines the built content of an AutoStep content source (i.e. a raw file becomes a set of built content).

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltContent.Steps
member.summary: Gets or sets any general step definitions defined in the file.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltContent.Feature
member.summary: Gets or sets the (optional feature) found in the file.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltElement
member.summary: Represents a generic built element that has a position in a file.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltElement.SourceLine
member.summary: Gets or sets the line number in the source.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltElement.SourceColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the column position on the line.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature
member.summary: Defines a built Feature block, that can contain Background and Scenarios.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature.Annotations
member.summary: Gets the annotations applied to the feature, in applied order.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the feature.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the description body (if any).

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature.Background
member.summary: Gets or sets the background set, or null if none is specified.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFeature.Scenarios
member.summary: Gets the list of scenarios.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFile
member.summary: Defines a built file (which is a defined set of autostep content, with a known source).

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltFile.SourceName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the source (usually a file name).

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltScenario
member.summary: Represents a built 'Scenario', that can have a name, annotations, a description and a set of steps.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltScenario.Annotations
member.summary: Gets the annotations applied to the feature, in applied order.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltScenario.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the scenario.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltScenario.Description
member.summary: Gets or sets the scenario description.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltStepCollection
member.summary: Defines an element that can contain a list of steps.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltStepCollection.Steps
member.summary: Gets the set of steps in the collection.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltStepDefinition
member.summary: Represents a step definition.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.BuiltTable
member.summary: Represents a table built from autostep source.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltTable.Header
member.summary: Gets the header row.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltTable.ColumnCount
member.summary: Gets the number of columns expected in the table (based on the number of headers).

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.BuiltTable.Rows
member.summary: Gets the non-header rows in the table.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.BuiltTable.AddRow(AutoStep.Core.TableRow)
member.summary: Adds a row to the table.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.CompiledStepReference
member.summary: Represents a reference to a compiled step.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.DefinedStepReference
member.summary: Defines a step reference that is bound to a step defined within the autostep project.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.IAnnotatable
member.summary: Indicates that a built element can have annotations applied to it.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.IAnnotatable.Annotations
member.summary: Gets the annotations applied to the feature, in applied order.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.OptionElement
member.summary: Defines an option annotation.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.OptionElement.Name
member.summary: Gets or sets the option name.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.OptionElement.Setting
member.summary: Gets or sets the setting name.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.PositionalElement
member.summary: Represents a built element that understands it ends before line terminates (e.g. an argument).

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.PositionalElement.EndColumn
member.summary: Gets or sets the column position at which the element ends.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument
member.summary: Represents a provided argument to a Step Reference.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument.RawArgument
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw argument text.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument.EscapedArgument
member.summary: Gets or sets the escaped argument body.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the parsed value of the argument. Null for interpolated arguments and arguments that contain example replacements.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the argument type.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepArgument.Symbol
member.summary: Gets or sets an optional leading symbol from the original value ($, Â£, etc).

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.StepReference
member.summary: Represents a reference to a Step inside a written test.
member.remarks: The base class does not understand binding or what can run, it just defines the information about the written line in the test.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.BindingType
member.summary: Gets or sets the determined used to bind against a declared Step. This will usually only differ from when the step is of the type, and the binding is determined by a preceding step. A null value indicates there was no preceding step, so a compilation error probably occurred anyway.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.Type
member.summary: Gets or sets the declared type of the step reference.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.RawText
member.summary: Gets or sets the raw text of the Step Reference, without having processed any escaped characters.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.Arguments
member.summary: Gets the set of arguments presented by the Step Reference.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.Table
member.summary: Gets or sets the associated table for this step.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.StepReference.AddArgument(AutoStep.Core.StepArgument)
member.summary: Adds an argument to the step reference.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.StepType
member.summary: Defines the possible step types.

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.StepType.Given
member.summary: Given step.

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.StepType.When
member.summary: When step.

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.StepType.Then
member.summary: Then step.

member.name: F:AutoStep.Core.StepType.And
member.summary: And step; bound to one of the other types.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.TableCell
member.summary: Represents a table cell. A cell's value is treated as a statement argument.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.TableCell.Value
member.summary: Gets or sets the cell's value.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.TableHeader
member.summary: Represents the header of a table.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.TableHeader.Headers
member.summary: Gets the list of headers.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.TableHeader.AddHeader(AutoStep.Core.TableHeaderCell)
member.summary: Add a header.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.TableHeaderCell
member.summary: Represents a table header cell.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.TableHeaderCell.HeaderName
member.summary: Gets or sets the name of the header.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.TableRow
member.summary: Represents a data-holding row in a table.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.TableRow.Cells
member.summary: Gets the set of cells in the row.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.TableRow.AddCell(AutoStep.Core.TableCell)
member.summary: Add a cell to the row.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.TagElement
member.summary: Represents a tag annotation.

member.name: P:AutoStep.Core.TagElement.Tag
member.summary: Gets or sets the value of the tag.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.Tracing.ITracer
member.summary: Defines the types of tracing that a tracer must support.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.Tracing.ITracer.TraceInfo(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invoked when an info-level event occurs.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.Tracing.ITracer.TraceWarn(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invoked when a warning-level event occurs.

member.name: M:AutoStep.Core.Tracing.ITracer.TraceError(System.Exception,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Invoked when an error-level event occurs.
member.param: The exception related to the error.

member.name: T:AutoStep.Core.UnknownStepReference
member.summary: Represents an unlinked step reference.
